abstract: The Jaguar Financial Corporation says it has the support of shareholders representing 8 percent of RIM's shares.
snippet: The Jaguar Financial Corporation says it has the support of shareholders representing 8 percent of RIM's shares.
lead_paragraph: The call is growing louder for Research in Motion to explore a sale of all or part of the company.

headline.main: Investor Says Momentum Builds for Breakup of Research in Motion
